actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Workforce Protections.

official_title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to increase the Federal minimum wage by $1.62 over 3 years.

summary.text: Amends the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to increase the Federal minimum wage (currently $5.15 per hour) to: (1) $5.65 per hour beginning on the effective date of this Act; (2) $6.15 per hour beginning one year after the effective date of this Act; and (3) $6.77 per hour beginning two years after the effective date of this Act.

titles.title: To amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to increase the Federal minimum wage by $1.62 over 3 years.
